Articles.Content: It would be really helpful if there were buttons in the contracts window where you could either accept all of them or decline all of them. "Decline all" would be available from the start, but the "Accept all" would only be unlocked once the building reaches level 3, where you can have an unlimited amount of them.
Just curious, why do you want them?  Most contracts are scary and there is a rep penalty to reject contracts.

Oh, there's a penalty to reject them? I thought it was just for failing or dropping one you've accepted. 

In either case, I support the idea. It won't add much but could possibly create either benefits or problems depending on how it's used.

9 hours ago, ment18 said:

Just curious, why do you want them?  Most contracts are scary and there is a rep penalty to reject contracts.

Yeah, but a button like this would be useful for if someone is trying to get a specific contract. The rep penalty is super small anyway.
The rep penalty was introduced for the exact purpose of preventing people from using the contracts window as a slot machine i.e. trying to get the contract they want.
The Penalty is nonsense because waiting 5 days at the Center spawns up a complete new sets of contracts and is much easyer that klicking them all away
